General.Name: Argo Gold Inc
General.Description: Argo Gold Inc., an exploration and development stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in northwestern Ontario. The company explores for gold, silver, copper, and zinc deposits. Its flagship project is the 100% owned Uchi gold project located to the west of Uchi Lake in the Birch-Uchi Greenstone Belt, Ontario. The company was formerly known as Arbitrage Exploration Inc. and changed its name to Argo Gold Inc. in September 2016. Argo Gold Inc. was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 350 Bay Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 2S6
